attributes.action:
No mandatory vaccination for COVID 19 
No discrimation for not take it
attributes.additional_details: Let people decide if they want to have it or not. We are free people. No discrimation because of this. We are free
attributes.background: No mandatory vaccination for COVID 19 as its against the law, the freedom, against religion. No discrimination people who dont want to vaccinate. We want to have freedom to go to school, work and restaurants. Its against religion as it include aborted cells (catholic religion) its against freedom.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323442

It is already against the law for people to be required to undergo medical treatment, including vaccinations. The Coronavirus Act 2020 has not changed this.
